front.title: RTP Payload Format for MPEG-4 Streams

abstract.t: This document describes a payload format for transporting MPEG-4encoded data using RTP. MPEG-4 is a recent standard from ISO/IEC forthe coding of natural and synthetic audio-visual data. Severalservices provided by RTP are beneficial for MPEG-4 encoded datatransport over the Internet. Additionally, the use of RTP makes itpossible to synchronize MPEG-4 data with other real-time data types.
